name: Slime Adventure (Twister207)
description:
This is Slime Adventure, a heartwarming story and adventure about a slime who lost his life and his family.

An innocent slime leaving his home to get food for his family is slaughtered and finds out his family is slaughtered too after he mysteriously reappears in the world.

Avenge your family and take revenge on the world in this tale of mass adventure!


Note, this game is barley playable and doesn't have any real gameplay yet, I'm just putting it here so friends can try what I do have so far.
